raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ All parts required for this process can be found in Albtraum. #L "Ancient Scrap of Spirit Knowledge" "267677" #L "Ancient Scrap of Saturated Spirit Knowledge" "267679" #L "Crystalised Memories of an Archer" "267708" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Ancient Scrap of Spirit Knowledge + Ancient Scrap of Saturated Spirit Knowledge = #L "Ancient Scrap of Condensed Spirit Knowledge" "267680" Skills: | 1750 PT | Ancient Scrap of Condensed Spirit Knowledge + Crystalised Memories of an Archer = #L "Ice of Albtraum - Special Arrows" "267929" Skills: | 1250 CL |
